titles.title: Teachers are Leaders Act of 2022
Teachers are Leaders Act of 2022
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for a teacher leader development program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Teachers are Leaders Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes through FY2028 the Teacher Quality Partnership program. It also authorizes grants for the establishment of professional development programs for teachers who remain in the classroom while also carrying out formalized leadership responsibilities.
